name: Salad Dressing - Garlic Mayo (500 ML)
description: This Garlic Mayo Salad Dressing recipe is perfect for those looking to add a flavorful twist to their salads without compromising on health. Although it is tagged as high-sodium and high-sugar, this version has been healthified to fit into healthy eating plans, making it a guilt-free addition to your meals.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and finely mince the garlic cloves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the minced garlic with mayonnaise.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vinegar to the mayo and garlic mixture and whisk until the vinegar is well incorporated and the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the garlic mayo to a container and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
